homePage.title: Hello world!
homePage.about: This app is a mobile device management app.

footer.legal: Display based on the Specified Commercial Transactions Law
footer.helpCenter: Help center and frequently asked questions

hero.title:
Simple and ideal

Device Management
hero.description: Device loss security. Efficient asset management of devices. Bulk device setup to streamline business operations.

phoneManagement.title: You can manage all Android devices powerfully.

screenPinning.description: You can pin apps to the screen.

lostMode.description: You can get location information in lost mode.

restrictions.description: You can restrict the use of cameras and external media.

pcConsoleAppsManagement.title: Manage applications with a company Google account

appInfo.description: You can get detailed information about the target app.

personalGoogleAccount.description: You can deliver apps without a personal Google account.

limitedPublicAndroidApp.description: You can deliver limited public Android apps.

pwa.description: You can deliver progressive web apps (PWAs).

useCase.title: You can efficiently manage devices in various cases.

appDistribution.title: Bulk app distribution
appDistribution.description: You can deliver apps to all devices at once.

autoSetup.title: Automated initial setup
autoSetup.description: You can automate initial setup to streamline business operations.

lostDevice.title: Get location information when a device is lost
lostDevice.description: You can get the location of a lost device.

technologyStack.title:
We operate with

modern technology stacks.
technologyStack.description:
We use the latest technologies such as Next.js, Vercel,

and Supabase to develop and operate efficiently.

freeTrial.title: Start a free trial
freeTrial.description:
You can start managing Android devices with a company Google account.

First, experience managing Android devices with a free trial.

The first 500 people can try it for free up to 10 Android devices.

If you have any questions, please contact us.
